activities: This certification applies to the personal information about EEA data subjects that BandPage collects through the provision and operation of its website, www.BandPage.com.  BandPage receives, maintains, and processes such personal information for different purposes depending on the particular service being provided, which could include e-commerce, data and content syndication, sales and marketing, personalizing BandPage products and services, data analysis, fraud detection and management, compliance with legal requirements, protection of BandPage and others' rights, and generally to provide, operate, and improve its website and services to users.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
